text: Fábio Gonçalves dos Santos, commonly known as Fábio (born 19 September 1978 in São José dos Campos, Brazil) is a Brazilian football goalkeeper, who last played for Botafogo-SP. ==Career== He was second choice behind fellow Brazilian Marcos after signing for Marítimo in 2006 from ADAP. Goiás officially signed the former Portuguesa's goalkeeper on 12 May 2010. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:People from São José dos Campos Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:C.S. title: Fábio (footballer, born 1978)
